# Project Management and Scrum Software
  * fast and easy to use
  * shows **actual progress** , not just wishful thinking
  * provides **powerful analytics** for data-driven management
  * more than just Scrum: project management and collaboration for the **whole company**


[![See-plans-and-prices-button](https://asset0.acunote.com/images/acunote/see-plans-and-prices-button.png?1688991217)](http://acunote.com/</plans-and-prices>)
![Acunote-screenshot](https://asset0.acunote.com/images/acunote/acunote-screenshot.png?1688991217)
Our customers:
Integrates with: 
## Here's What Customers are Saying About Acunote
![Mark-friedgan](https://asset0.acunote.com/images/acunote/mark-friedgan.jpg?1688991217)
### Mark Friedgan
CIO, **Enova Financial** Enterprise Acunote User 
Enterprise Acunote has helped our organization of over 300 people across 7 departments take advantage of information we already had to produce realistic target dates and manage a portfolio of projects with shared resources. 
![Andy-ashton](https://asset0.acunote.com/images/acunote/andy-ashton.jpg?1688991217)
### Andy Ashton
Solutions Architect, **EMC** Corporate Acunote User 
Acunote is fast and easy to use. Our distributed team uses Acunote for Scrum, bugtracking and requirements management. It gives a complete project view, in one system. It was critical to the success of our million dollar project. 
##  What Is Acunote 
Acunote is an agile project management tool and Scrum software. Companies from 1 to 100,000 people use it to manage software development, IT project management, and as an online project management software for the whole company. 
![Bob-gill](https://asset0.acunote.com/images/acunote/bob-gill.jpg?1688991217)
### Bob Gill
Project Manager, **IBM** Enterprise Acunote User 
Acunote is disarmingly simple, but extremely powerful at the same time. Whether a project is following a Waterfall or Agile methodology, Acunote serves the same purpose of providing a transparent, simple, flexible and economical tool for collaboration. 
##  How Acunote Is Different 
###  1. Fast and Easy to Use 
Acunote is fast and easy to use for everybody. Small teams can keep their todo lists. Large enterprises can track the work of hundreds of employees. 
Acunote is fast no matter how much data you have and usable for both technical and non-technical users. 
###  2. Shows Actual Progress 
Because Acunote is fast and easy, people use it for their daily work. This way actual execution data gets into the system. 
Using that data Acunote shows you the actual progress in burndown charts, not just wishful thinking. 
###  3. Provides Powerful Analytics 
Acunote lets you roll up the execution data into reports appropriate for any level of corporate hierarchy - from workers to CEO. 
This way you can manage individuals, teams and the whole company in a data-driven fashion. 
###  4. Works for the Whole Company 
Acunote works for the whole company as a unified project management, communication and collaboration tool. It is a single place for you to see the status of your company's efforts. 
###  5. Integrates with Existing Tools 
Acunote integrates with tools that you may already use: Google Apps, source control systems (Subversion, GitHub, Bitbucket, Perforce), bugtrackers (JIRA, Trac, FogBugz, Bugzilla, Mantis). 
"Acunote fits the way software is developed and shows the current reality of projects underway." 
John Ware, **iWin** , Director of Web Development Enterprise Acunote User 
"Acunote is the perfect tool for managing my development team. It’s quick, it’s simple, it’s scalable." 
Benjamin Bryant, **Earbits** , VP Technology Corporate Acunote User 
"Acunote's UI is fast, light and intuitive. And, that's coming from a 'usability guy'." 
Charles Hacskaylo, **Loyalty Lab** ,Chief Creative Officer Corporate Acunote User 
"Acunote shows me what is committed and what will get done. It's a kick-ass tool!" 
Anthony Skipper, **ServiceMesh** ,Vice President Enterprise Acunote User

generated_description:
### Acunote: Streamlining Project Management for All Companies

**Website**: [acunote.com](http://acunote.com)

**Overview**: Acunote is a powerful project management tool designed for both agile and traditional methodologies. It caters to a wide range of organizations, from small teams to large enterprises, by providing a user-friendly platform for managing projects and collaboration.

**Location**: San Francisco, CA

**Incubator**: Acunote is part of the Y Combinator Batch W11. 

**Functionality**:
- **Agile Project Management**: Acunote excels in agile project management and Scrum software, striking a balance between simplicity and functionality. It enables teams to manage software development and IT projects effectively.
- **Visibility into Actual Progress**: Unlike many tools that promote wishful thinking, Acunote gives teams real-time insights into actual project progress through intuitive burndown charts and analytical reports. It makes sure that everyone—from team members to executives—has a clear understanding of where things stand.
- **Powerful Analytics**: The platform rolls up data across the organization, enabling teams to manage their projects in a data-driven way, enhancing visibility and accountability.
- **Integration with Existing Tools**: It seamlessly integrates with popular tools like Google Apps, GitHub, JIRA, and more, making it adaptable for teams already entrenched in certain workflows.

**Key Features**:
1. **Fast and Easy to Use**: Acunote is designed to be straightforward, so both technical and non-technical users find it accessible. Its speed ensures it remains efficient even with large volumes of data.
2. **Unified Company Tool**: It's more than just a Scrum tool; Acunote functions as a comprehensive project management and collaboration platform for the entire organization.
3. **Support for Any Project Methodology**: Whether your team follows Agile, Waterfall, or a hybrid approach, Acunote provides the flexibility needed to manage it effectively.

**Customer Testimonials**:
- **Mark Friedgan, CIO of Enova Financial**: Praises Acunote for helping manage portfolios across multiple departments with realistic target dates.
- **Andy Ashton, Solutions Architect at EMC**: Highlights its role in the success of significant projects through streamlined Scrum and bug tracking.
- **Bob Gill, Project Manager at IBM**: Calls it simple yet extraordinarily powerful—ideal for facilitating collaboration regardless of project methodology.

### Contact Information
- **Email**: [support@acunote.com](mailto:support@acunote.com)
- **Phone**: 650-227-4953
- **Address**: 969-G Edgewater Blvd, #300, Foster City, CA 94404-3760

Acunote stands out not just as a tool for project management but as a partner in enhancing productivity and collaboration within teams of all sizes. It's built for the modern workspace, making project management less of a hassle and more of a strategic advantage.
